title: Dictionary
content:
The various dictionary definitions of a word and its popular use in the society which may not officially appear in dictionaries.

This section tries to help resolve the conflict in the society due to the disagreement in the definition of words. Words are human constructs which have definitions we agree with or became popularly used in the society.

The meaning or definition of a word may change through time. What is important about it is its purpose to help in communicating the message we want to relay to the other person or party.
